Html:
After installation of CSD and I am unable to see ConfigurationSectionDesigner project or Configuration Section Designer item in an existing project.
Please help me out.

Hello,

  I got the same issue this morning. I solve it with the help of this post : http://csd.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=26790

 Just copy

  •  ConfigurationSectionProject.zip from "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 9.0\Common7\IDE\ProjectTemplates\CSharp\1033\" to "<My Documents>\Visual Studio 2008\Templates\ProjectTemplates\Visual C#\"
  • ConfigurationSectionDesigner.zip from "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 9.0\Common7\IDE\ItemTemplates\CSharp\1033" to "<My Documents>\Visual Studio 2008\Templates\ItemTemplate\Visual C#\"

Hope this will work for you too
